languages.text: {n}Мужчина мрачнеет.{/n} "Появилась, правда, хворь одна на Янусе... От ней волосы выпадают, шкура выцветает да голос пропадает. Бывает, был еще в том году нормальный человек, богобоязненный, а сегодня — чистый выродок, скверна Человечества. Мы таких немочами зовем. Истребить бы их всех до единого, а то смотреть на их страшно. Ну, мы и травим их потихоньку".

{n}His expression darkens.{/n} "There's this plague going around on Janus, though... Makes your hair fall out, your skin go pale, and your voice disappear. Turns normal, Emperor-fearing people into right freaks, scum of Humanity. We call folks like that retches. Scary to look at — better to put them all down. Well, we do, little by little. With poison."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина мрачнеет.{/n} "Появилась, правда, хворь одна на Янусе... От ней волосы выпадают, шкура выцветает да голос пропадает. Бывает, был еще в том году нормальный человек, богобоязненный, а сегодня — чистый выродок, скверна Человечества. Мы таких немочами зовем. Истребить бы их всех до единого, а то смотреть на их страшно. Ну, мы и травим их потихоньку".

traits.locale_text: {n}His expression darkens.{/n} "There's this bug going around on Janus, though... Makes your hair fall out, your skin goes pale, you lose your voice. Turns normal, Emperor-fearing blokes into right freaks, the taint of Humanity. We call folks like that retches. Scary to look at. Better to put them all down. Well, we try, little by little."
traits.speaker: OldMan

Turns normal, Emperor-fearing blokes into right freaks, the taint of Humanity. We call folks like that retches. Scary to look at. Better to put them all down. Well, we try, little by little."

Turns average, Emperor-fearing people into right freaks, vice of Humanity. We call folks like that retches. Scary to look at — better to put them all down. Well, we do, little by little. Turns normal, Emperor-fearing people into right freaks, scum of Humanity. We call folks like that retches. Scary to look at — better to put them all down. Well, we do, little by little. With poison."
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}他的表情黯淡下来。{/n}“不过，加努斯爆发了瘟疫……那种病会让你头发掉光，皮肤花白，说不出话，把我们这些敬畏帝皇的小老百姓变成怪物，变成人类的渣滓。我们管这种人叫‘丑恶种’，要我说，最好把他们全都消灭。老实说，我们正在这么干。我们用毒药，一点一点消灭他们。”
languages.original_text: {n}His expression darkens.{/n} "There's this plague going around on Janus, though... Makes your hair fall out, your skin go pale, and your voice disappear. Turns normal, Emperor-fearing people into right freaks, scum of Humanity. We call folks like that retches. Scary to look at — better to put them all down. Well, we do, little by little. With poison."

traits.locale_text: {n}他的表情黯淡下来。{/n}“不过，加努斯爆发了瘟疫……那种病会让你头发掉光，皮肤花白，说不出话。把我们这些敬畏帝皇的小老百姓变成怪物，变成人类的怪胎，我们管这种人叫‘丑恶种’，要我说，最好把他们全都消灭。老实说，我们正在这么干。我们用毒药，一点一点消灭他们。”
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}彼の表情は暗くなった。{/n}「ヤヌスではこの妙な病が広がっています…髪が抜け、肌が青白くなり、声が出せなくなる。平凡な皇帝を恐れる人々を、人間のクズに、怪物に変えてしまんです。そのような人々の事を、我々は吐き気と呼びます。見るのはあまりにもおぞましい…全滅させるべです。まぁ、少しずつ毒で殺していますがね」
languages.original_text: {n}His expression darkens.{/n} "There's this plague going around on Janus, though... Makes your hair fall out, your skin go pale, and your voice disappear. Turns normal, Emperor-fearing people into right freaks, scum of Humanity. We call folks like that retches. Scary to look at — better to put them all down. Well, we do, little by little. With poison."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の表情は暗くなった。{/n}「ヤヌスではこの妙な病が広がっています…髪が抜け、肌が青白くなり、声が出せなくなる。平凡な皇帝を恐れる人々を、人間のクズに、怪物に変えてしまんです。そのような人々の事を、我々は吐き気と呼びます。見るのはあまりにもおぞましい…全滅させるべです。まぁ、少しずつ毒で殺していますがね」
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Su rostro se oscurece.{/n} «Sin embargo, en Janus hay una plaga... Hace que se te caiga el pelo, la piel palidezca y pierdas la voz. La gente corriente, temerosa del Emperador, acaba convertida en monstruos inmundos, en la escoria de la Humanidad. A esas cosas las llamamos los degenerados. Da miedo mirarlos... Habría que matarlos. Y poco a poco, el veneno funciona».
languages.original_text: {n}His expression darkens.{/n} "There's this plague going around on Janus, though... Makes your hair fall out, your skin go pale, and your voice disappear. Turns normal, Emperor-fearing people into right freaks, scum of Humanity. We call folks like that retches. Scary to look at — better to put them all down. Well, we do, little by little. With poison."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su rostro se oscurece.{/n} «Sin embargo, en Janus hay una plaga... Hace que se te caiga el pelo, la piel palidezca y pierdas la voz. La gente corriente, temerosa del Emperador, acaba convertida en monstruos inmundos. A esas cosas las llamamos los degenerados. Da miedo mirarlos... Habría que matarlos. Y poco a poco, el veneno funciona».
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Seine Miene verdüstert sich.{/n} "Aber auf Janus grassiert eine Seuche ... Die Haare fallen einem davon aus, die Haut wird blass, die Stimme verschwindet. Sie verwandelt gewöhnliche, imperator-fürchtige Leute in richtige Freaks, den Abschaum der Menschheit. Wir nennen diese Leute Speier. Sie bieten einen gruseligen Anblick, es ist besser, sie alle zu töten. Na ja, und das tun wir auch, Stück für Stück. Mit Gift."
languages.original_text: {n}His expression darkens.{/n} "There's this plague going around on Janus, though... Makes your hair fall out, your skin go pale, and your voice disappear. Turns normal, Emperor-fearing people into right freaks, scum of Humanity. We call folks like that retches. Scary to look at — better to put them all down. Well, we do, little by little. With poison."

traits.locale_text: {n}Seine Miene verdüstert sich.{/n} "Aber auf Janus grassiert eine Seuche ... Die Haare fallen einem davon aus, die Haut wird blass, die Stimme verschwindet. Sie verwandelt gewöhnliche, imperator-fürchtige Leute in richtige Freaks, Geißeln der Menschheit. Wir nennen diese Leute Speier. Sie bieten einen gruseligen Anblick, es ist besser, sie alle zu töten. Na ja, und das tun wir auch, Stück für Stück. Mit Gift."
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Son visage s'assombrit.{/n} « Après, y a quand même une drôle d'épidémie qui fait des ravages sur Janus... Ceux qui l'attrapent perdent leurs cheveux et leur voix, et leur peau devient toute pâle. Même les sujets les plus normaux de l'Empereur deviennent de véritables monstres, la lie de l'humanité. On les appelle les infâmes. Franchement, ils font peur à voir. Le mieux, ce serait d'abréger leurs souffrances. Et c'est ce qu'on fait, petit à petit. Avec du poison. »
languages.original_text: {n}His expression darkens.{/n} "There's this plague going around on Janus, though... Makes your hair fall out, your skin go pale, and your voice disappear. Turns normal, Emperor-fearing people into right freaks, scum of Humanity. We call folks like that retches. Scary to look at — better to put them all down. Well, we do, little by little. With poison."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son visage s'assombrit.{/n} « Après, y a quand même une drôle d'épidémie qui fait des ravages sur Janus... Ceux qui l'attrapent perdent leurs cheveux et leur voix, et leur peau devient toute pâle. Même les sujets les plus fervents de l'Empereur deviennent de véritables monstres, des vices de l'humanité. On les appelle les infâmes. Franchement, ils font peur à voir. Le mieux, ce serait d'abréger leurs souffrances. Et c'est ce qu'on fait, petit à petit. Avec du poison. »
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Yüz ifadesi karamsarlaşıyor.{/n} "Gerçi Janus'u bir vebadır aldı, gidiyor... İnsanın saçını döküyor, tenini solduruyor, sesini kısıyor. Doğru düzgün, İmparator korkusu olan adamların aklı başından gidiyor, insanlıktan çıkıyor. Biz burada öylelerine yıkık diyoruz. Yüzüne baksan asabın bozulur, hepsini indirmek lazım. Eh, teker teker indiriyoruz da. Zehirliyoruz."
languages.original_text: {n}His expression darkens.{/n} "There's this plague going around on Janus, though... Makes your hair fall out, your skin go pale, and your voice disappear. Turns normal, Emperor-fearing people into right freaks, scum of Humanity. We call folks like that retches. Scary to look at — better to put them all down. Well, we do, little by little. With poison."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüz ifadesi karamsarlaşıyor.{/n} "Gerçi Janus'u bir vebadır aldı, gidiyor... İnsanın saçını döküyor, tenini solduruyor, sesini kısıyor. Doğru düzgün, İmparator korkusu olan adamların aklı başından gidiyor, insanlıktan çıkıyor. Biz burada öylelerine yıkık, diyoruz. Yüzüne baksan asabın bozulur, hepsini indirmek lazım. Eh, teker teker indiriyoruz da. Zehirliyoruz."
traits.speaker: OldMan
